scripts.make_link: mkdir -p node_modules && cd node_modules && rm -fr xeira && ln -fs ../../../../ xeira
scripts.x-prepare: npm run x-reset && npm i && npm run --silent make_link
scripts.x-run-rollup: npm run --silent x-prepare-rollup && npm run --silent x-demo-init && npm run --silent x-compare-rollup
scripts.x-run-nollup: npm run --silent x-prepare-nollup && npm run --silent x-demo-init && npm run --silent x-compare-nollup
scripts.x-run: npm run --silent x-run-rollup && npm run --silent x-run-nollup
